name: Selina Stefen
feedback: BooksHouse made managing my reading list effortless. I can finally track what I’ve read and what’s next!
The reading progress tracker on BooksHouse is a game-changer. It keeps me motivated to finish books on time!

name: Shariful Islam
feedback: Perfect for book lovers! I love how easy it is to categorize books and add personal reviews on BooksHouse.
The interface of BooksHouse is clean and responsive. I even share my shelf with friends to recommend reads.

name: Adelina Terescova
feedback: Finally, an online bookshelf that makes sense! I’ve logged over 30 books already with BooksHouse.
The custom categories and reading goals on BooksHouse keep me organized and inspired. Highly recommended!
